examples.text: Sustu bu gece, karardı yine ay / Kaldı geriye cevapsız sorular
examples.translation: This night has become quiet, the moon has darkened once again / Unanswered questions were left behind

etymology: Inherited from Ottoman Turkish قرارمق (kararmak). Morphologically kara (“dark, black”) + -r + -mak. Compare Crimean Tatar qararmaq (“to become black”) and Azerbaijani qaralmaq (“to become black”).
